InitialFeedbackHistory:
06/07/2023
Since you mention no factors that restrict sharing you can consider using a repository such as KU Leuven RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) or a disciplinary repository for both data sharing and preservation, you can restrict access if needed but this makes it easier for others to find your data, and you will get a DOI that makes you data citable, for more information see www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
